alert.note: Alert for Dundy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 10:29AM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001...079...252 AND 253... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma and Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson. In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne. In Nebraska...Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy. * Timing...Through sunset this evening. * Winds...Southwest winds at 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph, shifting to the northwest during the afternoon. Near the Colorado border, winds will shift to the northwest by early afternoon. In northwest Kansas, the northwesterly wind shift will occur during the mid to late afternoon. * Relative Humidity...10 to 15 percent. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised today. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
